description: This file contains a React functional component 'RightPanelSettings' that manages user profile settings including display name and status updates.

methods.name: RightPanelSettings({ profile, onProfileUpdate, theme, setTheme, isMobile })
methods.description: A functional component that receives user profile data and provides an interface to edit it along with a theme switch.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: A method that updates the profile with new local state and exits the edit mode.
